details.description: SlickScroll is a JavaScript library that allows developers to add smooth scrolling effects to their webpages.

Grillzzy Foods is a food manufacturing company that manufactures and distributes packaged meat products. The Grillzzy website captures their brand identity as connoisseurs of Authentic South Asian Food.

Kelowna Wholesale Auto is a automobile retailer that sell second hand vehicles at affordable prices. Using modern web technologies, I created a website with a complete listing management solution creating their digital presence.
Fayâ€™s Salon is a hair salon that makes the ordinary stylish. Working with them, I created a booking and customer management system that automated the tedious in thier business.

Kelowna Islamic Center is a Muslim community in Kelowna BC that hopes to connect Muslims with one another. I worked with KIC to create a digital platform for all their community to connect and created a scalable and reliable platform.
